meanings.sent1: The carny operated the Ferris wheel with a big smile.
meanings.sent2: I saw the carny selling tickets for the roller coaster.
meanings.sent3: The carny juggled colorful balls to entertain the crowd.

meanings.sent5: Children laughed as the carny made funny faces while running the game booth.
